name: Occa Home
overview:
Founded in 2009 by Kate Mooney, Occa-Home is an innovative retail and eCommerce solution that has fast become The UK’s Premier Online Interior Design Destination.

Occa-Home offers time pressed and style conscious customers designer branded home furnishings, lighting, accessories and lifestyle collections, curated by professional interior designers and available to buy internationally, online 24/7.

With over 200 new products uploaded weekly and fresh interior design content added daily; the site is a dynamic and interactive emporium of home interiors and interior design ideas delivered by the professional Occa Design team.

An unrivaled range of luxury gifts and wedding gift ideas with next day delivery, compliments the extensive home-wares collection making Occa Home a one stop shop providing everything for the stylish home.

A rich design heritage that spans over 20 years of designing and purchasing for global hotels & high end residential projects ensures the Occa-Home concept is original and stands alone - re-defining not only the way customers purchase designer home furnishings, but how new and interesting suppliers reach this often fragmented and growing market.

Occa-Home is a technology led company - the lifestyle brand that brings together the world’s best branded and designer home-wares.

With its established supply chain, professional design background, informative magazine style blog & mood-board functionality, Occa Home is the online authority on interiors and designer lifestyle looks.
